name: Edge Hill Residential Weekend
description:
Participants will attend a two day residential weekend at Edge Hill University where participants will meet some of our Industry partners at our first careers fair. Sessions will include speakers George MacKay-Shore, Martin Mannion, Sophia Thakur, Kristina McGuirk and Vimla Appadoo. Topics covered will Personal Branding and Self Care and particpants will have a choice of two breakout sessions on Big Data or Ethical Hacking.

Students must attend at least 100% of the residential weekend to qualify for the attendance badge, this is verified using the sign in sheets.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of attendance

criteria.narrative: Participants must attend the weekend in order to be awarded the digital badge.
